alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Cherokee; Etowah; St. Clair; Talladega (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 5:21PM CDT until July 21 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Talladega County in east central Alabama... Calhoun County in east central Alabama... Eastern Etowah County in northeastern Alabama... St. Clair County in central Alabama... Southern Cherokee County in northeastern Alabama... * Until 600 PM CDT. * At 521 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Ballplay to near Ragland to Leeds, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Gadsden, Anniston, Oxford, Talladega, Pell City, Jacksonville, Leeds, Moody, Rainbow City, Piedmont, Hokes Bluff, Odenville, West End-Cobb Town, Cobb Town, Fort McClellan, Saks, Lincoln, Glencoe, Margaret and Argo. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
